text: <a href="../2-Chronicles-3-1/" title="2 Chronicles 3:1 KJV verse detail"><span id="3" class="versehover">1 Then Solomon began to build the house of the LORD at Jerusalem in mount Moriah, where *the LORD* appeared unto David his father, in the place that David had prepared in the threshingfloor of Ornan the Jebusite.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-2/" title="2 Chronicles 3:2 KJV verse detail"><span id="4" class="versehover">2 And he began to build in the second *day* of the second month, in the fourth year of his reign.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-3/" title="2 Chronicles 3:3 KJV verse detail"><span id="5" class="versehover">3 Now these *are the things wherein* Solomon was instructed for the building of the house of God. The length by cubits after the first measure *was* threescore cubits, and the breadth twenty cubits.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-4/" title="2 Chronicles 3:4 KJV verse detail"><span id="6" class="versehover">4 And the porch that *was* in the front *of the house*, the length *of it was* according to the breadth of the house, twenty cubits, and the height *was* an hundred and twenty: and he overlaid it within with pure gold.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-5/" title="2 Chronicles 3:5 KJV verse detail"><span id="7" class="versehover">5 And the greater house he cieled with fir tree, which he overlaid with fine gold, and set thereon palm trees and chains.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-6/" title="2 Chronicles 3:6 KJV verse detail"><span id="8" class="versehover">6 And he garnished the house with precious stones for beauty: and the gold *was* gold of Parvaim.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-7/" title="2 Chronicles 3:7 KJV verse detail"><span id="9" class="versehover">7 He overlaid also the house, the beams, the posts, and the walls thereof, and the doors thereof, with gold; and graved cherubims on the walls.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-8/" title="2 Chronicles 3:8 KJV verse detail"><span id="10" class="versehover">8 And he made the most holy house, the length whereof *was* according to the breadth of the house, twenty cubits, and the breadth thereof twenty cubits: and he overlaid it with fine gold, *amounting* to six hundred talents.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-9/" title="2 Chronicles 3:9 KJV verse detail"><span id="11" class="versehover">9 And the weight of the nails *was* fifty shekels of gold. And he overlaid the upper chambers with gold.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-10/" title="2 Chronicles 3:10 KJV verse detail"><span id="12" class="versehover">10 And in the most holy house he made two cherubims of image work, and overlaid them with gold.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-11/" title="2 Chronicles 3:11 KJV verse detail"><span id="13" class="versehover">11 And the wings of the cherubims *were* twenty cubits long: one wing *of the one cherub was* five cubits, reaching to the wall of the house: and the other wing *was likewise* five cubits, reaching to the wing of the other cherub.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-12/" title="2 Chronicles 3:12 KJV verse detail"><span id="14" class="versehover">12 And *one* wing of the other cherub *was* five cubits, reaching to the wall of the house: and the other wing *was* five cubits *also*, joining to the wing of the other cherub.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-13/" title="2 Chronicles 3:13 KJV verse detail"><span id="15" class="versehover">13 The wings of these cherubims spread themselves forth twenty cubits: and they stood on their feet, and their faces *were* inward.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-14/" title="2 Chronicles 3:14 KJV verse detail"><span id="16" class="versehover">14 And he made the vail *of* blue, and purple, and crimson, and fine linen, and wrought cherubims thereon.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-15/" title="2 Chronicles 3:15 KJV verse detail"><span id="17" class="versehover">15 Also he made before the house two pillars of thirty and five cubits high, and the chapiter that *was* on the top of each of them *was* five cubits.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-16/" title="2 Chronicles 3:16 KJV verse detail"><span id="18" class="versehover">16 And he made chains, *as* in the oracle, and put *them* on the heads of the pillars; and made an hundred pomegranates, and put *them* on the chains.

<a href="../2-Chronicles-3-17/" title="2 Chronicles 3:17 KJV verse detail"><span id="19" class="versehover">17 And he reared up the pillars before the temple, one on the right hand, and the other on the left; and called the name of that on the right hand Jachin, and the name of that on the left Boaz.
